Number of Column info: Select the number of columns for your locker configuration here. Columns are always placed next to each other, so the more columns you select, the wider the locker layout will be
Choose Width info: With this option you can choose the width of the boxes. Do you want to offer extra storage space? Then choose the 40 cm wide variant
Box per Column info: With this option you choose how many boxes you want per column. Please note that the height per compartment changes as soon as you select more or fewer compartments
Choose key system info: Select the desired lock for the lockers here.
Accessories info: The locker arrangement can be equipped with various accessories, such as a sloping roof, plinth, leg frame or bench. Please note that adding these accessories will increase the total height of the locker arrangement.
Did you kow? (Optional) info: Enrich your locker with extra functionalities. Below we offer as an extra addition.
Swipe to configuration n the frame: Swipe to configuration n the frame
Choose key system sub: Discover the lock solutions and possibilities
